00018 void CPlayGameVorticon::processOnWorldMap()
00019 {
00020  int useobject;
00021 
00022  // Perform player Objects...
00023  m_Player[0].processWorldMap();
00024 
00025  // entered a level, used ship, teleporter, etc.
00026  if( !m_Player[0].hideplayer && !m_Player[0].beingteleported )
00027  {
00028   useobject = m_Player[0].getNewObject();
00029   if( useobject != 0 )
00030   {
00031    // If it is teleporter, make the Player teleport
00032    int TeleportID;
00033    if( (TeleportID = getTeleporterInfo(useobject)) != 0 )
00034    {
00035     teleportPlayer(TeleportID, m_Player[0]);
00036    }
00037    else
00038    {
00039     // If it is level, change the playgame mode and load the new map. Nessie is
00040     // a special case in Episode 3
00041     switch(useobject)
00042     {
00043     case NESSIE_WEED:
00044     case NESSIE_PATH: break;
00045     case NESSIE_LAND:
00046      m_Player[0].MountNessieIfAvailable();
00047      g_pInput->flushAll();
00048      break;
00049 
00050     case LVLS_SHIP:
00051      if (m_Episode==1)
00052       YourShipNeedsTheseParts();
00053      else if (m_Episode==3)
00054       ShipEp3();
00055 
00056      break;
00057 
00058     default: // a regular level
00059      // Check if Level has been completed or the Level-Replayability is enabled
00060      if( !mp_level_completed[useobject & 0x7fff] || mp_option[OPT_LVLREPLAYABILITY].value )
00061      {
00062       // Create the special merge effect
00063       CColorMerge *pColorMergeFX = new CColorMerge(8);
00064 
00065       m_level_command = START_LEVEL;
00066       m_Level = useobject & 0x7fff;
00067       g_pMusicPlayer->stop();
00068       g_pSound->playStereofromCoord(SOUND_ENTER_LEVEL, PLAY_NOW, m_Player[0].scrx);
00069       // save where on the map, the player entered. This is a checkpoint!
00070       m_checkpoint_x = m_Player[0].getXPosition();
00071       m_checkpoint_y = m_Player[0].getYPosition();
00072       m_checkpointset = true;
00073       cleanup();
00074       init();
00075 
00076       g_pGfxEngine->pushEffectPtr(pColorMergeFX);
00077      }
00078      break;
00079     }
00080    }
00081   }
00082  }
00083 
00084  if(m_Player[0].mounted)
00085  {
00086   if(g_pInput->getPressedAnyCommand(0))
00087   {
00088    m_Player[0].UnmountNessie();
00089    g_pInput->flushAll();
00090   }
00091  }
00092 
00093  if(m_showKeensLeft) showKeensLeft();
00094 
00095 }
00096 
00097 void CPlayGameVorticon::goBacktoMap()
00098 {
00099  // Create the special merge effect (Fadeout)
00100  CColorMerge *pColorMergeFX = new CColorMerge(8);
00101 
00102  // before he can go back to map, he must tie up the objects.
00103  // This means, all objects except the puppy ones of the player....
00104  m_Object.clear();
00105 
00106  m_level_command = START_LEVEL;
00107  m_Level = WM_MAP_NUM;
00108  g_pMusicPlayer->stop();
00109  // Now that the new level/map will be loaded, the players aren't dead anymore!
00110  std::vector<CPlayer>::iterator player= m_Player.begin();
00111  for( ; player != m_Player.end() ; player++ )
00112  {
00113   player->level_done = LEVEL_NOT_DONE;
00114   player->HealthPoints = 1;
00115 
00116   // Restore checkpoint
00117   player->moveToForce(m_checkpoint_x,m_checkpoint_y);
00118   player->inventory.HasCardYellow = 0;
00119   player->inventory.HasCardBlue = 0;
00120   player->inventory.HasCardGreen = 0;
00121   player->inventory.HasCardRed = 0;
00122  }
00123  cleanup();
00124  init();
00125 
00126  // Second Snapshot for merge
00127  g_pGfxEngine->pushEffectPtr(pColorMergeFX);
00128 }
00129 
00130 void CPlayGameVorticon::YourShipNeedsTheseParts()
00131 {
00132  CMessageBox *MessageBox = new CMessageBox(g_pBehaviorEngine->getString("EP1_SHIP"));
00133 
00134  bool joy, bat, vac, wis;
00135  joy = bat = vac = wis = false;
00136 
00137  // The Multiplayer support for this dialog. You collect those parts together if more than one player.
00138  for(int i=0 ; i<m_NumPlayers ; i++)
00139  {
00140   joy |= m_Player[i].inventory.HasJoystick;
00141   bat |= m_Player[i].inventory.HasBattery;
00142   vac |= m_Player[i].inventory.HasVacuum;
00143   wis |= m_Player[i].inventory.HasWiskey;
00144  }
00145 
00146  // draw needed parts
00147  if (!joy) MessageBox->addTileAt(321,5<<3, 4<<3);
00148  if (!bat) MessageBox->addTileAt(322,8<<3, 4<<3);
00149  if (!vac) MessageBox->addTileAt(323,11<<3,4<<3);
00150  if (!wis) MessageBox->addTileAt(324,14<<3,4<<3);
00151  m_MessageBoxes.push_back(MessageBox);
00152 }
00153 
00154 void CPlayGameVorticon::ShipEp3()
00155 {
00156  // get one of four random strings and display it!!
00157  std::string strname = "EP3_SHIP"+ itoa((rand()%4)+1);
00158  m_MessageBoxes.push_back(new CMessageBox(g_pBehaviorEngine->getString(strname)));
00159 }

00161 void CPlayGameVorticon::showKeensLeft()
00162 {
00163  const unsigned int KEENSLEFT_X = 7;
00164  const unsigned int KEENSLEFT_Y = 10;
00165 
00166  if(!mp_KeenLeftSfc)
00167  {
00168   SDL_Surface *p_blitSurface = g_pVideoDriver->FGLayerSurface;
00169   const Uint32 rmask = p_blitSurface->format->Rmask;
00170   const Uint32 gmask = p_blitSurface->format->Gmask;
00171   const Uint32 bmask = p_blitSurface->format->Bmask;
00172   const Uint32 amask = p_blitSurface->format->Amask;
00173   const Uint8 bpp = p_blitSurface->format->BitsPerPixel;
00174 
00175   int x,y,i,p;
00176   int boxY, boxH;
00177   CFont &Font = g_pGfxEngine->getFont(0);
00178 
00179   const unsigned int KEENSLEFT_W = 24;
00180   const unsigned int KEENSLEFT_H = 4;
00181 
00182   boxY = KEENSLEFT_Y - m_NumPlayers;
00183   boxH = KEENSLEFT_H + m_NumPlayers*2;
00184 
00185   SDL_Rect rect;
00186   rect.x = (KEENSLEFT_X+1)*8; rect.y = (boxY+2)*8;
00187   rect.w = (KEENSLEFT_W+1)*8; rect.h = (boxH)*8;
00188   SDL_Surface *boxsurface = SDL_CreateRGBSurface(p_blitSurface->flags, rect.w, rect.h, bpp, rmask, gmask, bmask, amask);
00189 
00190   rect.x = 8; rect.y = 16;
00191   rect.w = (KEENSLEFT_W-1)*8; rect.h = (boxH-3)*8;
00192   g_pGfxEngine->drawDialogBox( boxsurface, 0, 0, KEENSLEFT_W, boxH, Font.getBGColour(true));
00193   SDL_FillRect(boxsurface, &rect, Font.getBGColour(false));
00194   Font.drawFont( boxsurface, g_pBehaviorEngine->getString("LIVES_LEFT"), 36, 8, true);
00195 
00196   y = 20;
00197   for(p=0; p<m_NumPlayers ; p++)
00198   {
00199    x = 12;
00200    for(i=0;i<m_Player[p].inventory.lives&&i<=10;i++)
00201    {
00202     g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(m_Player[p].playerbaseframe+PMAPDOWNFRAME).drawSprite(boxsurface, x, y );
00203     x+=16;
00204    }
00205    y += 16;
00206   }
00207 
00208   mp_KeenLeftSfc = SDL_DisplayFormat(boxsurface);
00209   SDL_FreeSurface(boxsurface);
00210  }
00211  else
00212  {
00213   SDL_Rect local_rect;
00214   local_rect.x = (KEENSLEFT_X+1)*8;
00215   local_rect.y = (KEENSLEFT_Y - m_NumPlayers + 2)*8;
00216   local_rect.w = mp_KeenLeftSfc->w;
00217   local_rect.h = mp_KeenLeftSfc->h;
00218 
00219   SDL_BlitSurface(mp_KeenLeftSfc, NULL, g_pVideoDriver->FGLayerSurface, &local_rect);
00220 
00221   if( g_pTimer->HasTimeElapsed(3000) || g_pInput->getPressedAnyCommand() )
00222   {
00223    m_showKeensLeft = false;
00224    SDL_FreeSurface(mp_KeenLeftSfc);
00225   }
00226  }
00227 
00228 
00229 }
00230 
00231 int CPlayGameVorticon::getTeleporterInfo(int objectID)
00232 {
00233  if(m_Episode == 1) {
00234   if( objectID > 33 && objectID < 47 ) return objectID;
00235  }
00236  else if(m_Episode == 3) {
00237   if( (objectID & 0xF00) == 0xF00) return objectID;
00238  }
00239  return 0;
00240 }
00241 
00242 
00243 /**
00244  * Teleporter part
00245  */
00246 void CPlayGameVorticon::teleportPlayer(int objectID, CPlayer &player)
00247 {
00248  int destx, desty;
00249  int origx, origy;
00250  m_Map.findObject(objectID, &origx, &origy);
00251  CTeleporter *teleporter = new CTeleporter(&m_Map, m_Player,origx<<CSF, origy<<CSF);
00252  teleporter->solid = false;
00253  teleporter->direction = TELEPORTING_IN;
00254  if(m_Episode == 1)
00255   readTeleportDestCoordinatesEP1(objectID, destx, desty);
00256  else if(m_Episode == 3)
00257   readTeleportDestCoordinatesEP3(objectID, destx, desty);
00258  teleporter->destx = destx>>TILE_S;
00259  teleporter->desty = desty>>TILE_S;
00260  teleporter->whichplayer = player.m_index;
00261  m_Object.push_back(teleporter);
00262 }
00263 
00264 void CPlayGameVorticon::readTeleportDestCoordinatesEP1(int objectID, int &destx, int &desty)
00265 {
00266  destx = desty = 0;
00267 
00268  std::vector<stTeleporterTable>::iterator TTable =
00269    g_pBehaviorEngine->getTeleporterTable().begin();
00270  size_t i = 0;
00271  for( ; TTable != g_pBehaviorEngine->getTeleporterTable().end() ; TTable++, i++ )
00272  {
00273   if(TTable->objectnumber2 == objectID || TTable->objectnumber1 == objectID)
00274   {
00275    destx = TTable->x;
00276    desty = TTable->y;
00277    break;
00278   }
00279  }
00280 }
00281 
00282 void CPlayGameVorticon::readTeleportDestCoordinatesEP3(int objectID, int &destx, int &desty)
00283 {
00284  destx = desty = 0;
00285 
00286  int newObject = objectID & 0x00F;
00287  newObject <<= 4;
00288  newObject += 0xF00; // Now its a teleporter, we only need to find the right one on the map
00289 
00290  for(int i=newObject; i<newObject+0x10 ; i++)
00291  {
00292   if(m_Map.findObject(i, &destx, &desty))
00293   {
00294    destx <<= TILE_S;
00295    desty <<= TILE_S;
00296    return;
00297   }
00298  }
00299 }
